article.title: Kratos Wins Army Innovative Technology and Research Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The Weapon Systems Solutions Division of Kratos Defense and Security Solutions Inc. has been awarded a five-year broad agency announcement contract by the U.S. Army Aviation and Missile Research, Development and Engineering Center (AMRDEC) Weapons Development and Integration Directorate. Under the contract, valued at up to $25 million, Kratos will develop technologies for missile design, multispectral hardware-in-the-loop testing, simulation and sensors.
